aka: Ghosts from the Past (How History Got into Me)

writer.name: 鲍里斯·莱赫曼 Boris Lehman

director.name: 鲍里斯·莱赫曼 Boris Lehman

this_title: Fantômes du passé (comment l'histoire est entrée en moi)
trans_title: Ghosts from the Past (How History Got into Me)
introduction: How to talk about History, the big one and the small one, ours and that of each of us? Watching television, browsing the Internet, rummaging through the stock of world archives? Or more simply, going back to our own images that built us?
chinese_title: Fantômes du passé (comment l'histoire est entrée en moi)
